name: assemblyscript-inverter-chip
description: Inverter Chip for Wokwi, built using Assembly Script

scripts.build: rimraf dist && asc --use abort=src/wokwi-api/abort --use seed=src/wokwi-api/seed --exportTable --runtime stub -o dist/inverter.chip.wasm src/main.ts && copyfiles inverter.chip.json dist

author: Uri Shaked
